Matijašević najavio razgovore i povratak Jovića u reprezentaciju
02 Nov 2019, 10:54 by Milos
Sukob između selektora Srbije Ljubiše Tumbakovića i fudbalera Real Madrida Luke Jovića glavna je tema vezana za naš nacionalni tim u poslednjih nekoliko nedelja.
Jasno je da je neophodno da dođe do kompromisa zbog dobrobiti tima, što je u razgovoru za Informer potencirao i sportski direktor reprezentativnih selekcija Vladimir Matijašević.
– Treba preći preko nekih stvari za dobrobit srpskog fudbala. Bilo je šta je bilo, trebalo bi zaboraviti nesuglasice. Ne treba da se diže fama. Jović je počeo da igra za Real Madrid, dao je gol, davaće ih još i normalno je da bude u reprezentaciji. Na Tumbakoviću je da odluči hoće li Jovića vratiti već za novembarske mečeve sa Luksemburgom i Ukrajinom ili kasnije. Luka je rekao da će se uvek odazvati pozivu i to je lepo. Razgovaraćemo svi između sebe. Ne znam da li su pričali selektor i Luka, znam da do petka nisu. Ali biće vremena, ljudi smo. Budite sigurni, svi gledamo dobrobit reprezentacije. Ne treba da budemo sujetni, pronaći ćemo zajednički jezik. Ali, moraju da se poštuju neka pravila. To se ne odnosi samo na igrače, već i na nas u Savezu, rekao je Matijašević za Informer.
Matijašević je naglasio da je Jović budućnost nacionalnog tima, ali da se ne meša u izbor selektora.
– Naravno da niko ne želi aferu i siguran sam da se to neće desiti. Svaki igrač koji želi da igra za reprezentaciju treba da se ponaša kao reprezentativac. Mislim da će sve to proći kako treba. Luka je budućnost reprezentacije, a da li će sada biti na spisku za novembar ili na nekom drugom, odluka je na selektoru. U Tumbakovićev rad se ne mešam, dodao je sportski direktor FSS.

Matijašević announced the talks and the return of Jović to the national team
02 Nov 2019, 10:54 by Milos
The clash between Serbian coach Ljubisa Tumbakovic and Real Madrid football player Luka Jovic has been a major topic of concern for our national team in recent weeks.
It is clear that it is necessary to reach a compromise for the benefit of the team, which was also emphasized in the interview with Informer by the sports director of the national team selections Vladimir Matijašević.
- We need to go over some things for the benefit of Serbian football. Whatever it was, disagreements should be forgotten. No need to raise a fama. Jovic started playing for Real Madrid, he scored, he will give them more and it is normal to be in the national team. It is up to Tumbakovic to decide whether to return Jovic for November's matches with Luxembourg and Ukraine or later. Luke said he would always answer the call and that's nice. We'll talk to each other. I don't know if the coach and Luke talked, I know they didn't until Friday. But there will be times, we humans. Rest assured, we are all looking at the well-being of the national team. We need not be vain, we will find common ground. But some rules must be followed. This applies not only to the players, but also to us in the Alliance, Matijašević told Informer.
Matijašević emphasized that Jović is the future of the national team, but that he does not interfere in the selection of selectors.
- Of course no one wants an affair and I'm sure it won't happen. Every player who wants to play for the national team should act as a national team player. I think it will all work out right. Luka is the future of the national team, and whether it will now be on the roster for November or another, the decision is up to the coach. I do not interfere with Tumbakovic's work, added the FSS sports director.
